job_history.work_description: Prepare quarterly and annual financial statements for 17 multi-family communities for distribution to investors and financial institutions. Reconcile and account for all activity on the income statement and balance sheet including cash, fixed assets, derivatives, equity, and property debt. Coordinate and review work of external audit firms. Initiate capital calls and distributions for investors. Manage budgets and construction loan activity for approximately $100,000,000 in active construction projects in FL, MA, and MD.

Performed quarterly and annual close procedures for MSREF (Morgan Stanley Real Estate Funds) 6I, the largest international real estate investment fund to date with $8 billion of partnership assets, and draft financial statements distributed directly to fund investors. Lead quarterly management fee process by performing work to draft approximately $14,000,000 in bills to fund Partners. Develop work plan to ensure deadlines are met, test results, delegate work to other Fund Controllers, and perform detailed review of their work.

Performed research to locate red flags in numerous potential fraudulent mortgages at one of the largest bank failures in U.S. history. Developed writing skills by drafting over forty memorandums that summarized potential fraud in loans that were presented to multiple agencies of the Government. Wrote a thirty-five page corporate intelligence narrative explaining personal and Professional relationships of an individual under investigation.

Held private sessions to teach financial accounting to over 25 individual client needs and wrote practice questions which resulted in grade improvement amongst all clients, including one who increased his exam performance by 35 percentage points after sessions.

interests: Fulton County CASA Board of Directors Member, Treasurer

skills.name: Financial Statement Preparation
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience preparing quarterly and annual financial statements for multiple entities, including those with complex financial structures, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Financial Reconciliation
skills.explanation: Has consistently reconciled and accounted for all activity on income statements and balance sheets, including complex financial instruments, demonstrating expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Audit and Compliance
skills.explanation: Has coordinated and reviewed work of external audit firms, and performed research to locate red flags in potential fraudulent mortgages, suggesting strong proficiency in audit and compliance.

skills.name: Budgeting and Financial Management
skills.explanation: Has managed budgets and construction loan activity for large-scale projects, and initiated capital calls and distributions for investors, indicating strong proficiency in financial management.

skills.name: Leadership and Management
skills.explanation: Has led teams and coordinated work with external parties, including audit firms and investors, demonstrating strong proficiency in leadership and management.

skills.name: Financial Analysis and Modeling
skills.explanation: Has performed financial analysis and modeling for complex financial instruments and transactions, suggesting strong proficiency in financial analysis and modeling.

skills.name: Accounting and Financial Reporting
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience with financial accounting and reporting, including preparation of financial statements and management of financial records, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Teaching and Tutoring
skills.explanation: Has experience teaching financial accounting to individual clients, resulting in improved grades and performance, indicating a solid working proficiency in teaching and tutoring.

skills.name: Research and Investigation
skills.explanation: Has performed research to locate red flags in potential fraudulent mortgages, and developed writing skills by drafting memorandums and reports, suggesting a solid working proficiency in research and investigation.

skills.name: Non-Profit Management
skills.explanation: Has experience as a board member and treasurer for a non-profit organization, suggesting some practical experience in non-profit management.
